testimonials.text: A charismatic personality with dedication and self motivational character. Highly Professional on his work with maturity towards the resposibilities. Srikanth would be an asset to any team. My best wishes!!

Srikanta proved to be a terrific person to work with. He is a goal oriented and ambitious student cum alumni. Srikanta never refuses you when you ask him for help. He showed a high level of Full stack technical skills. Very positive attitude and he learns quickly!
Srikanta is a sharp learner, very much dedicated to his work and always spreads positively around. He has good management skills too.
